00047 GPC_Canvas::GPC_Canvas(
00048     int width,
00049     int height
00050 ) : 
00051     m_width(width),
00052     m_height(height),
00053     m_bannersEnabled(false)
00054 {
00055     // initialize area so that it's available for game logic on frame 1 (ImageViewport)
00056     m_displayarea.m_x1 = 0;
00057     m_displayarea.m_y1 = 0;
00058     m_displayarea.m_x2 = width;
00059     m_displayarea.m_y2 = height;
00060 }

00063 GPC_Canvas::~GPC_Canvas()
00064 {
00065     DisposeAllBanners();
00066 }

00087 void GPC_Canvas::Resize(int width, int height)
00088 {
00089     m_width = width;
00090     m_height = height;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void GPC_Canvas::EndFrame()
00094 {
00095     if (m_bannersEnabled)
00096         DrawAllBanners();   
00097 }

00101 {
00102     ::glClearColor(r,g,b,a);

00104 
00105 void GPC_Canvas::SetViewPort(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
00106 {
00107         /*  x1 and y1 are the min pixel coordinate (e.g. 0)
00108             x2 and y2 are the max pixel coordinate
00109             the width,height is calculated including both pixels
00110             therefore: max - min + 1
00111         */
00112         
00113         /* XXX, nasty, this needs to go somewhere else,
00114          * but where... definitely need to clean up this
00115          * whole canvas/rendertools mess.
00116          */
00117     glEnable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST);
00118 
00119     glViewport(x1,y1,x2-x1 + 1,y2-y1 + 1);
00120     glScissor(x1,y1,x2-x1 + 1,y2-y1 + 1);
00121 };

00124 void GPC_Canvas::ClearBuffer(
00125     int type
00126 ) {
00127 
00128     int ogltype = 0;
00129     if (type & RAS_ICanvas::COLOR_BUFFER )
00130         ogltype |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
00131     if (type & RAS_ICanvas::DEPTH_BUFFER )
00132         ogltype |= GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT;
00133 
00134     ::glClear(ogltype);
00135 }

00138 GPC_Canvas::TBannerId GPC_Canvas::AddBanner(
00139     unsigned int bannerWidth, unsigned int bannerHeight,
00140     unsigned int imageWidth, unsigned int imageHeight,
00141     unsigned char* imageData, 
00142     TBannerAlignment alignment, bool enabled)
00143 {
00144     TBannerData banner;
00145 
00146     banner.alignment = alignment;
00147     banner.enabled = enabled;
00148     banner.displayWidth = bannerWidth;
00149     banner.displayHeight = bannerHeight;
00150     banner.imageWidth = imageWidth;
00151     banner.imageHeight = imageHeight;
00152     unsigned int bannerDataSize = imageWidth*imageHeight*4;
00153     banner.imageData = new unsigned char [bannerDataSize];
00154     ::memcpy(banner.imageData, imageData, bannerDataSize);
00155     banner.textureName = 0;
00156 
00157     m_banners.insert(TBannerMap::value_type(++s_bannerId, banner));
00158     return s_bannerId;
00159 }

00161 
00162 void GPC_Canvas::DisposeBanner(TBannerId id)
00163 {
00164     TBannerMap::iterator it = m_banners.find(id);
00165     if (it != m_banners.end()) {
00166         DisposeBanner(it->second);
00167         m_banners.erase(it);
00168     }
00169 }
00170 
00171 void GPC_Canvas::DisposeAllBanners()
00172 {
00173     TBannerMap::iterator it = m_banners.begin();
00174     while (it != m_banners.end()) {
00175         DisposeBanner(it->second);
00176         it++;
00177     }
00178 }
00179 
00180 void GPC_Canvas::SetBannerEnabled(TBannerId id, bool enabled)
00181 {
00182     TBannerMap::iterator it = m_banners.find(id);
00183     if (it != m_banners.end()) {
00184         it->second.enabled = enabled;
00185     }
00186 }

00189 void GPC_Canvas::SetBannerDisplayEnabled(bool enabled)
00190 {
00191     m_bannersEnabled = enabled;
00192 }

00194 
00195 void GPC_Canvas::DisposeBanner(TBannerData& banner)
00196 {
00197     if (banner.imageData) {
00198         delete [] banner.imageData;
00199         banner.imageData = 0;
00200     }
00201     if (banner.textureName) {
00202         ::glDeleteTextures(1, (GLuint*)&banner.textureName);
00203     }
00204 }
00205 
00206 void GPC_Canvas::DrawAllBanners(void)
00207 {
00208     if (!m_bannersEnabled || (m_banners.size() < 1))
00209         return;
00210     
00211     // Save the old rendering parameters.
00212 
00213     CanvasRenderState render_state;
00214     PushRenderState(render_state);
00215 
00216     // Set up everything for banner display.
00217     
00218     // Set up OpenGL matrices 
00219     SetOrthoProjection();
00220     // Activate OpenGL settings needed for display of the texture
00221     ::glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00222     ::glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00223     ::glDisable(GL_FOG);
00224     ::glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00225     ::glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00226     ::glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00227 
00228     TBannerMap::iterator it = m_banners.begin();
00229     while (it != m_banners.end()) {
00230         if (it->second.enabled) {
00231             DrawBanner(it->second);
00232         }
00233         it++;
00234     }
00235 
00236     PopRenderState(render_state);
00237 }
00238 
00239 
00240 void GPC_Canvas::DrawBanner(TBannerData& banner)
00241 {
00242     if (!banner.enabled)
00243         return;
00244 
00245     // Set up coordinates
00246     int coords[4][2];
00247     if (banner.alignment == alignTopLeft) {
00248         // Upper left
00249         coords[0][0] = 0;
00250         coords[0][1] = ((int)m_height)-banner.displayHeight;
00251         coords[1][0] = banner.displayWidth;
00252         coords[1][1] = ((int)m_height)-banner.displayHeight;
00253         coords[2][0] = banner.displayWidth;
00254         coords[2][1] = ((int)m_height);
00255         coords[3][0] = 0;
00256         coords[3][1] = ((int)m_height);
00257     }
00258     else {
00259         // Lower right
00260         coords[0][0] = (int)m_width - banner.displayWidth;
00261         coords[0][1] = 0;
00262         coords[1][0] = m_width;
00263         coords[1][1] = 0;
00264         coords[2][0] = m_width;
00265         coords[2][1] = banner.displayHeight;
00266         coords[3][0] = (int)m_width - banner.displayWidth;
00267         coords[3][1] = banner.displayHeight;
00268     }
00269     // Set up uvs
00270     int uvs[4][2] = {
00271         { 0, 1},
00272         { 1, 1},
00273         { 1, 0},
00274         { 0, 0}
00275     };
00276 
00277     if (!banner.textureName) {
00278         ::glGenTextures(1, (GLuint*)&banner.textureName);
00279         ::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, banner.textureName);
00280         ::glTexImage2D(
00281             GL_TEXTURE_2D,          // target
00282             0,                      // level
00283             4,                      // components
00284             banner.imageWidth,      // width
00285             banner.displayHeight,   // height
00286             0,                      // border
00287             GL_RGBA,                // format
00288             GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,       // type
00289             banner.imageData);      // image data
00290         ::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00291         ::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00292     }
00293     else {
00294         ::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, banner.textureName);
00295     }
00296 
00297     // Draw the rectangle with the texture on it
00298     ::glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00299     ::glColor4f(1.f, 1.f, 1.f, 1.f);
00300     ::glTexCoord2iv((GLint*)uvs[0]);
00301     ::glVertex2iv((GLint*)coords[0]);
00302     ::glTexCoord2iv((GLint*)uvs[1]);
00303     ::glVertex2iv((GLint*)coords[1]);
00304     ::glTexCoord2iv((GLint*)uvs[2]);
00305     ::glVertex2iv((GLint*)coords[2]);
00306     ::glTexCoord2iv((GLint*)uvs[3]);
00307     ::glVertex2iv((GLint*)coords[3]);
00308     ::glEnd();
00309 }

00311     void
00312 GPC_Canvas::
00313 PushRenderState(
00314     CanvasRenderState & render_state
00315 ) {
00316 #if 0
00317 
00318     ::glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00319     ::glPushMatrix();
00320     ::glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00321     ::glPushMatrix();
00322     ::glMatrixMode(GL_TEXTURE);
00323     ::glPushMatrix();
00324     // Save old OpenGL settings
00325     ::glGetIntegerv(GL_LIGHTING, (GLint*)&(render_state.oldLighting));
00326     ::glGetIntegerv(GL_DEPTH_TEST, (GLint*)&(render_state.oldDepthTest));
00327     ::glGetIntegerv(GL_FOG, (GLint*)&(render_state.oldFog));
00328     ::glGetIntegerv(GL_TEXTURE_2D, (GLint*)&(render_state.oldTexture2D));
00329     ::glGetIntegerv(GL_BLEND, (GLint*)&(render_state.oldBlend));
00330     ::glGetIntegerv(GL_BLEND_SRC, (GLint*)&(render_state.oldBlendSrc));
00331     ::glGetIntegerv(GL_BLEND_DST, (GLint*)&(render_state.oldBlendDst));
00332     ::glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_COLOR, render_state.oldColor);
00333     ::glGetIntegerv(GL_DEPTH_WRITEMASK,(GLint*)&(render_state.oldWriteMask));
00334 #else
00335 
00336     glPushAttrib(GL_ALL_ATTRIB_BITS);
00337 
00338 #endif
00339 }
00340 
00341     void
00342 GPC_Canvas::
00343 PopRenderState(
00344     const CanvasRenderState & render_state
00345 ) {
00346 #if 0
00347     // Restore OpenGL settings
00348     render_state.oldLighting ? ::glEnable(GL_LIGHTING) : glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00349     render_state.oldDepthTest ? ::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST) : glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00350     render_state.oldFog ? ::glEnable(GL_FOG) : ::glDisable(GL_FOG);
00351     render_state.oldTexture2D ? ::glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D) : glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00352     render_state.oldBlend ? glEnable(GL_BLEND) : ::glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00353     ::glBlendFunc((GLenum)render_state.oldBlendSrc, (GLenum)render_state.oldBlendDst);
00354     render_state.oldWriteMask ? ::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_WRITEMASK) : glDisable(GL_DEPTH_WRITEMASK);
00355 
00356     ::glColor4fv(render_state.oldColor);
00357     // Restore OpenGL matrices
00358     ::glMatrixMode(GL_TEXTURE);
00359     ::glPopMatrix();
00360     ::glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00361     ::glPopMatrix();
00362     ::glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00363     ::glPopMatrix();
00364 
00365 #else
00366 
00367     glPopAttrib();
00368 #endif
00369 }
00370 
00371     void
00372 GPC_Canvas::
00373 SetOrthoProjection(
00374 ) {
00375     // Set up OpenGL matrices 
00376     ::glViewport(0, 0, m_width, m_height);
00377     ::glScissor(0, 0, m_width, m_height);
00378     ::glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00379     ::glLoadIdentity();
00380     ::glOrtho(0, m_width, 0, m_height, -1, 1);
00381     ::glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00382     ::glLoadIdentity();
00383     ::glMatrixMode(GL_TEXTURE);
00384     ::glLoadIdentity();
00385 }

00387     void
00388 GPC_Canvas::
00389 MakeScreenShot(
00390     const char* filename
00391 ) {
00392     png_structp png_ptr;
00393     png_infop info_ptr;
00394     unsigned char *pixels = 0;
00395     png_bytepp row_pointers = 0;
00396     int i, bytesperpixel = 3, color_type = PNG_COLOR_TYPE_RGB;
00397     FILE *fp = 0;
00398 
00399     png_ptr = png_create_write_struct(PNG_LIBPNG_VER_STRING, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00400     if (!png_ptr) 
00401     {
00402         std::cout << "Cannot png_create_write_struct." << std::endl;
00403         return;
00404     }
00405 
00406     info_ptr = png_create_info_struct(png_ptr);
00407     if (!info_ptr) 
00408     {
00409         png_destroy_write_struct(&png_ptr, (png_infopp)NULL);
00410         std::cout << "Cannot png_create_info_struct." << std::endl;
00411         return;
00412     }
00413 
00414     if (setjmp(png_jmpbuf(png_ptr))) {
00415         png_destroy_write_struct(&png_ptr, &info_ptr);
00416         delete [] pixels;
00417         delete [] row_pointers;
00418         // printf("Aborting\n");
00419         if (fp) {
00420             fflush(fp);
00421             fclose(fp);
00422         }
00423         return;
00424     }
00425 
00426     // copy image data
00427 
00428     pixels = new unsigned char[GetWidth() * GetHeight() * bytesperpixel * sizeof(unsigned char)];
00429     if (!pixels) {
00430         std::cout << "Cannot allocate pixels array" << std::endl;
00431         return;
00432     }
00433 
00434     glReadPixels(0, 0, GetWidth(), GetHeight(), GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pixels);
00435 
00436     fp = fopen(filename, "wb");
00437     if (!fp)
00438     {
00439         std::cout << "Couldn't open " << filename << " for writing." << std::endl;
00440         longjmp(png_jmpbuf(png_ptr), 1);
00441     }
00442 
00443     png_init_io(png_ptr, fp);
00444 
00445 #if 0
00446     png_set_filter(png_ptr, 0,
00447                    PNG_FILTER_NONE  | PNG_FILTER_VALUE_NONE |
00448                    PNG_FILTER_SUB   | PNG_FILTER_VALUE_SUB  |
00449                    PNG_FILTER_UP    | PNG_FILTER_VALUE_UP   |
00450                    PNG_FILTER_AVG   | PNG_FILTER_VALUE_AVG  |
00451                    PNG_FILTER_PAETH | PNG_FILTER_VALUE_PAETH|
00452                    PNG_ALL_FILTERS);
00453 
00454     png_set_compression_level(png_ptr, Z_BEST_COMPRESSION);
00455 #endif
00456 
00457     // png image settings
00458     png_set_IHDR(png_ptr,
00459                  info_ptr,
00460                  GetWidth(),
00461                  GetHeight(),
00462                  8,
00463                  color_type,
00464                  PNG_INTERLACE_NONE,
00465                  PNG_COMPRESSION_TYPE_DEFAULT,
00466                  PNG_FILTER_TYPE_DEFAULT);
00467 
00468     // write the file header information
00469     png_write_info(png_ptr, info_ptr);
00470 
00471     // allocate memory for an array of row-pointers
00472     row_pointers = new png_bytep [(GetHeight() * sizeof(png_bytep))];
00473     if (!row_pointers) 
00474     {
00475         std::cout << "Cannot allocate row-pointers array" << std::endl;
00476         longjmp(png_jmpbuf(png_ptr), 1);
00477     }
00478 
00479     // set the individual row-pointers to point at the correct offsets
00480     for (i = 0; i < GetHeight(); i++) {
00481         row_pointers[GetHeight()-1-i] = (png_bytep)
00482             ((unsigned char *)pixels + (i * GetWidth()) * bytesperpixel * sizeof(unsigned char));
00483     }
00484 
00485     // write out the entire image data in one call
00486     png_write_image(png_ptr, row_pointers);
00487 
00488     // write the additional chunks to the PNG file (not really needed)
00489     png_write_end(png_ptr, info_ptr);
00490 
00491     // clean up
00492     delete [] (pixels);
00493     delete [] (row_pointers);
00494     png_destroy_write_struct(&png_ptr, &info_ptr);
00495 
00496     if (fp) 
00497     {
00498         fflush(fp);
00499         fclose(fp);
00500     }
00501 }
